Windlord:

"Perplex think that he can get the information that we need from 
Gramps's data base" said Windlord "While we will try to find you... 
don't close the comm link we'll follow your signal " he told to 
Perplex "Follow me"

he located Aerotaur's signal and follow it

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "I've got them here with me.  We're... I'm not sure where we 
are.  I'll 
> send The Hero to find you and bring you here."  He turns off the 
com.  "Hero. 
>  Please do this for the team."
